languages.text: "От взора моего было сокрыто, какой я одержал победу, но устрашило меня не это... Взор черного волка был страшен. В нем была такая боль, какую сам он никогда бы не смог причинить. Она сводила его с ума, превращала в чудовище. И, сколь бы ни мрачен был его образ, я... узнаю себя в нем. Ведь я создан для разрушения, терзания, истребления. Я — ловчее чудовище. Значит ли это, что, по замыслу Всеотца, я должен испить эту чашу боли до дна, чтобы соответствовать его замыслу? Не знаю". {n}Ульфар загадочно смотрит на вас.{/n}

"As for which me emerged victorious, that was hidden from my sight. But that is not what frightened me... The black wolf's gaze was fearsome, full of more pain than he could ever inflict himself. It drove him mad, turning him into a monster. And, as dark as he appears, I... recognise myself in him. After all, I was made for destruction, torment, annihilation. I am the more agile monster. Does that mean that, by the Allfather's design, I must drink this cup of pain to the bottom in order to fulfil his plan? I do not know." {n}Ulfar looks at you, his expression inscrutable.{/n}

В нем была такая боль, какую сам он никогда бы не смог причинить. Она сводила его с ума, превращала в чудовище. И, сколь бы ни мрачен был его образ, я... узнаю себя в нем. Не знаю". {n}Ульфар загадочно смотрит на вас.{/n}

languages.text: “至于是哪个我获得了胜利，我并不清楚。不过，让我恐惧的并不是这件事情……那头黑狼的目光令人生畏，充满了他无法承受的痛苦。这样的痛苦最终将他逼疯，把他变成了怪物。尽管他看起来很邪恶，可我……却在他身上看到了我自己的影子。毕竟，我就是为了毁灭、折磨与痛苦，才来到了这个世界。与那个怪物相比，我要更加敏锐。这是否意味着，我必须喝下这杯苦厄之酒，才能实现全父的伟大计划？莫非这就是全父对我的安排？我不清楚答案。”{n}乌尔法看着你，你看不出他的表情意味着什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As for which me emerged victorious, that was hidden from my sight. But that is not what frightened me... The black wolf's gaze was fearsome, full of more pain than he could ever inflict himself. It drove him mad, turning him into a monster. And, as dark as he appears, I... recognise myself in him. After all, I was made for destruction, torment, annihilation. I am the more agile monster. Does that mean that, by the Allfather's design, I must drink this cup of pain to the bottom in order to fulfil his plan? I do not know." {n}Ulfar looks at you, his expression inscrutable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “至于是哪个我获得了胜利，我并不清楚。不过，让我恐惧的并不是这件事情……那头黑狼的目光令人生畏，充满了他无法承受的痛苦。这样的痛苦最终将他逼疯，把他变成了怪物。尽管他看起来很邪恶，可我……却在他身上看到了我自己的影子。毕竟，我就是为了毁灭、折磨与痛苦，才来到了这个世界。与那个怪物相比，我要更加敏锐。这是否意味着，我必须喝下这杯苦厄之酒，才能实现全父的伟大计划？莫非这就是全父对我的安排？我不清楚答案。”{n}乌尔法看着你，你看不出他的表情意味着什么。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「勝った方の俺はというと、視界から消えちまった。だが、俺を怖がらせるものではない…黒い狼の視線は恐ろしかったが、己自身を傷つけた苦痛に満ちていた。それが奴を狂わせ、怪物に変えた。それから奴が現れたときのような暗さになって、俺は…奴が俺の中にいると気づくんだ。結局、俺がしてきたのは壊し、苦しめ、殲滅することだった。俺の方が機敏な怪物だ。全知の父の計画なんだ、その計画を果たすために俺はこのカップに入った痛みを底まで飲み干さなくてはならないということだろ？俺には分からんが」{n}ウルファーは何を考えているのか分からない表情であなたを見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As for which me emerged victorious, that was hidden from my sight. But that is not what frightened me... The black wolf's gaze was fearsome, full of more pain than he could ever inflict himself. It drove him mad, turning him into a monster. And, as dark as he appears, I... recognise myself in him. After all, I was made for destruction, torment, annihilation. I am the more agile monster. Does that mean that, by the Allfather's design, I must drink this cup of pain to the bottom in order to fulfil his plan? I do not know." {n}Ulfar looks at you, his expression inscrutable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「勝った方の俺はというと、視界から消えちまった。だが、俺を怖がらせるものではない…黒い狼の視線は恐ろしかったが、己自身を傷つけた苦痛に満ちていた。それが奴を狂わせ、怪物に変えた。それから奴が現れたときのような暗さになって、俺は…奴が俺の中にいると気づくんだ。結局、俺がしてきたのは壊し、苦しめ、殲滅することだった。俺の方が機敏な怪物だ。全知の父の計画なんだ、その計画を果たすために俺はこのカップに入った痛みを底まで飲み干さなくてはならないということだろ？俺には分からんが」{n}ウルファーは何を考えているのか分からない表情であなたを見る。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «En cuanto a qué parte de mí se hizo con la victoria, es algo que no llegué a ver. Pero no es eso lo que me da miedo... La mirada del lobo negro era temible, llena de más dolor del que jamás llegará a infligir. Eso le hizo enloquecer y lo convirtió en un monstruo. Y, a pesar de su siniestro aspecto... me reconozco en él. A fin de cuentas fui creado para la destrucción, el tormento y la aniquilación. Soy el monstruo más ágil. ¿Significa eso que el Padre de todas las cosas quiere que beba de esta copa de dolor para cumplir su plan? No lo sé». {n}Ulfar te mira con gesto inescrutable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As for which me emerged victorious, that was hidden from my sight. But that is not what frightened me... The black wolf's gaze was fearsome, full of more pain than he could ever inflict himself. It drove him mad, turning him into a monster. And, as dark as he appears, I... recognise myself in him. After all, I was made for destruction, torment, annihilation. I am the more agile monster. Does that mean that, by the Allfather's design, I must drink this cup of pain to the bottom in order to fulfil his plan? I do not know." {n}Ulfar looks at you, his expression inscrutable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a qué parte de mí se hizo con la victoria, es algo que no llegué a ver. Pero no es eso lo que me da miedo... La mirada del lobo negro era temible, llena de más dolor del que jamás llegará a infligir. Eso le hizo enloquecer y lo convirtió en un monstruo. Y, a pesar de su siniestro aspecto... me reconozco en él. A fin de cuentas fui creado para la destrucción, el tormento y la aniquilación. Soy el monstruo más ágil. ¿Significa eso que el Padre de todas las cosas quiere que beba de esta copa de dolor para cumplir su plan? No lo sé». {n}Ulfar te mira con gesto inescrutable.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Quant à savoir laquelle des deux l'a emporté, cela ne m'a pas été révélé. Mais ce n'est pas ce qui m'a effrayé... Le regard du loup noir était terrifiant, empreint d'une douleur bien supérieure à celle qu'il pourrait infliger lui-même. Cette douleur l'a changé en monstre dément, et aussi ténébreux soit-il, je... me suis reconnu en lui. J'ai été créé pour la destruction, le tourment et l'anéantissement, après tout. Je suis le monstre le plus agile qui soit. Cela signifie-t-il que je dois boire cette coupe de douleur jusqu'à la lie pour accomplir le dessein du Père de Tous ? Je l'ignore. » {n}Ulfar vous regarde avec une expression indéchiffrable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As for which me emerged victorious, that was hidden from my sight. But that is not what frightened me... The black wolf's gaze was fearsome, full of more pain than he could ever inflict himself. It drove him mad, turning him into a monster. And, as dark as he appears, I... recognise myself in him. After all, I was made for destruction, torment, annihilation. I am the more agile monster. Does that mean that, by the Allfather's design, I must drink this cup of pain to the bottom in order to fulfil his plan? I do not know." {n}Ulfar looks at you, his expression inscrutable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quant à savoir laquelle des deux l'a emporté, cela ne m'a pas été révélé. Mais ce n'est pas ce qui m'a effrayé... Le regard du loup noir était terrifiant, empreint d'une douleur bien supérieure à celle qu'il pourrait infliger lui-même. Cette douleur l'a changé en monstre dément, et aussi ténébreux soit-il, je... me suis reconnu en lui. J'ai été créé pour la destruction, le tourment et l'anéantissement, après tout. Je suis le monstre le plus agile qui soit. Cela signifie-t-il que je dois boire cette coupe de douleur jusqu'à la lie pour accomplir le dessein du Père de Tous ? Je l'ignore. » {n}Ulfar vous regarde avec une expression indéchiffrable.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Welches meiner Ichs den Sieg davontrug, blieb meinem Blick verborgen. Aber das war nicht der Grund, warum es mir Angst machte ... Der Blick des schwarzen Wolfs war erschreckend, viel schmerzverzerrter, als er jemals selbst Schmerz zufügen könnte. Und das machte ihn wahnsinnig, verwandelte ihn in ein Monster. Und so finster er auch war, ich ... erkannte mich in ihm wieder. Denn letztlich war ich geschaffen für Zerstörung, Pein, Vernichtung. Ich bin das beweglichere Monster. Bedeutet das etwa, dass der Allvater wünscht, dass ich diesen Becher voller Schmerzen komplett austrinke, damit sein Plan aufgeht? Ich weiß es nicht." {n}Ulfar sieht dich an, seine Miene ist unergründlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As for which me emerged victorious, that was hidden from my sight. But that is not what frightened me... The black wolf's gaze was fearsome, full of more pain than he could ever inflict himself. It drove him mad, turning him into a monster. And, as dark as he appears, I... recognise myself in him. After all, I was made for destruction, torment, annihilation. I am the more agile monster. Does that mean that, by the Allfather's design, I must drink this cup of pain to the bottom in order to fulfil his plan? I do not know." {n}Ulfar looks at you, his expression inscrutable.{/n}

Der Blick des schwarzen Wolfs war erschreckend, viel schmerzverzerrter, als er jemals selbst Schmerz zufügen könnte. Und das machte ihn wahnsinnig, verwandelte ihn in ein Monster. Und so finster er auch war, ich ... erkannte mich in ihm wieder. Denn letztlich war ich geschaffen für Zerstörung, Pein, Vernichtung. Ich bin das beweglichere Monster. Bedeutet das etwa, dass der Allvater wünscht, dass ich diesen Becher voller Schmerzen komplett austrinke, damit sein Plan aufgeht? Ich weiß es nicht." {n}Ulfar sieht dich an, seine Miene ist unergründlich.{/n}

languages.text: "Hangi ben zaferi kucakladım bilmiyorum. Beni korkutansa bu değildi. Kara kurdun bakışları korkunçtu, kendine veremeyeceği acılarla doluydu. Bu acılar onu delirtmiş, bir canavara dönüştürmüştü. Oldukça karanlık gözükse de... Onda kendimi gördüm. Sonuçta ben de yıkım, eziyet ve yok ediş için yaratıldım. Çevik bir yaratığım. Şimdi bu, Yücebaba'nın planını gerçekleştirmek için bu acı dolu kadehten kana kana içmem gerektiği anlamına mı geliyor? Bilmiyorum." {n}Ulfar, anlaşılmaz bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As for which me emerged victorious, that was hidden from my sight. But that is not what frightened me... The black wolf's gaze was fearsome, full of more pain than he could ever inflict himself. It drove him mad, turning him into a monster. And, as dark as he appears, I... recognise myself in him. After all, I was made for destruction, torment, annihilation. I am the more agile monster. Does that mean that, by the Allfather's design, I must drink this cup of pain to the bottom in order to fulfil his plan? I do not know." {n}Ulfar looks at you, his expression inscrutable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hangi ben zaferi kucakladım bilmiyorum. Fakat beni korkutan şey bu değildi. Kara kurdun bakışları korkunçtu, kendine veremeyeceği acılarla doluydu. Bu acılar onu delirtmiş, bir canavara dönüştürmüştü. Oldukça karanlık gözükse de... Onda kendimi gördüm. Sonuçta ben de yıkım, eziyet ve yok ediş için yaratıldım. Ben çevik bir yaratığım. Bu, Yücebaba'nın planını gerçekleştirmek için onun isteğiyle acının kadehinden içeceğim anlamına mı geliyor? Bilmiyorum." {n}Ulfar, anlaşılmaz bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
